plot outline: Raghuveera, a young boy falls in love with Anita but the girl's family rejects their relationship. However, She suggests him that they should elope and get married. All goes well for the couple until they are tricked into a trap by her cousin brother, who promises them to settle in life and separates them. To make matter worse, Raghu's final attempt to get back with Anita goes wrong as he is brutally beaten up by her family members.
title: Raghuveera
plot: _Raghuveera_ (qv) is based on the real life travails of Raghu. In the love story of Raghu and Anusha in 2011 the villain is brother of Anusha.

_Raghuveera_ (qv), a young boy falls in love with Anita but the girl's family rejects their relationship. However, She suggests him that they should elope and get married. All goes well for the couple until they are tricked into a trap by her cousin brother, who promises them to settle in life and separates them. To make matter worse, Raghu's final attempt to get back with Anita goes wrong as he is brutally beaten up by her family members.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
